header.title: The album of Georges
header.subtitle: Here is an album of Georges, the first french monkey

1.title: Georges on a rock
1.description: We can see Georges in his natural state. He is being a handsome guy on a rock

2.title: Georges the scientist
2.description: We can see Georges thinking about a quantum physics problem

3.title: Georges cutting wood
3.description: Georges is cutting wood to make a fire. We can see that he is very muscular
